message:
Congratulations!

Your proposal to speak at {{ doc.event_name }} has been accepted.

Login to the proposal page to view the comments from reviewers.

Do confirm your acceptance for giving this talk, within 48 hours, as reply to this email. We shall then finalize the logistics. You shall receive updates about schedule and other details soon after confirming.

We still look forward to having you at the meetup to attend talks, network, and share your ideas. Do reply to this email in case of any queries.

Regards,

Team {{ doc.event_name }}
name: CFP Acceptance!
subject: Congratulations! You CFP is accepted for {{ doc.event_name }}
